todo Keywords: + Annotations + Custom Annotations + Reflection
This project includes very simple examples involving Annotations.
AnnotationsDemo: Demonstrates how to read annotations attributes using reflection. A custom annotation @Author is defined, with several attributes. Then a couple of domain classes are created and annotated, and the main() method explores the attributes of the @Author annotations in those classes.
